title: HikingInTheRain
description: Simple application to acquire weather conditions at the trailhead of potential hikes. This app will provide alternative search options for events near you if no hikes match your search criteria.

title: VolClock
description: An application to track shifts, view upcoming schedule and contact supervisors for the TRU thrift store in Boulder, CO.

title: React Inbox
description: A full stack app allowing individuals to read, select, label and delete messages from an e-mail inbox.
languages: Node.js, React, Bootstrap, Knex.js, PostgreSQL, RESTful design, JavaScript
